page.title: 19NEW ROMNEY A TOURISM SURVEY
page.content: A STUDY WAS MADE OF PROVISIONS AVAILABLE FOR TOURISTS IN THE HIGH STREET,BASED ON NEEDS PLEASURE AND SERVICES. NEEDS.2 SUPERMARKETS,2 BANKS,3 GREENGROCERS,1 PHOTOGRAPHER,1 POST OFFICE,2 NEWSAGENTS,4 ESTATE AGENTS,1 BOOKSHOP,1 BOOKMAKERS AND ONE CHEMIST. PLEASURE.3 PUBLIC HOUSES,7 RESTAURANTS AND COFFEE SHOPS,1 CRAFT SHOP,2 DRESS SHOPS,2 HAIRDRESSERS,1 BEAUTY SHOP,6 ANTIQUE SHOPS,1 LIBRARY,THREE LISTED BUILDINGS,1 SPORTS SHOP.ACCOMODATION CAN BE AT THE CINQUE PORTS ARMS,THE NEW INN, THE BROAD ACRE HOTEL AND MOTEL. SERVICES.3 CAR PARKS ADJACENT TO THE HIGH STREET.ONE PETROL STATION IN THE HIGH STREET,ANOTHER ABOUT A MILE WEST OF THE TOWN.TOILET FACILITIES NEED IMPROVING.
